src: Les safaris sont peut-être le plus grand attrait touristique en Afrique et le moment le plus marquant pour de nombreux visiteurs. Dans le langage courant, le terme « safari » désigne une excursion sur la terre africaine, et en particulier dans la savane, ayant pour but d'assister au spectacle saisissant des animaux sauvages dans leur milieu. Certains animaux, tels que les éléphants et les girafes, ont tendance à s’approcher de près des voitures et l’équipement standard permet de bien les observer. Les lions, les guépards et les léopards sont parfois timides et vous les verrez mieux avec des jumelles. Un safari à pied (également appelé « marche en brousse », « safari pédestre » ou « footing ») consiste à faire de la randonnée, soit pendant quelques heures, soit pendant plusieurs jours.
mt: Safaris are perhaps the greatest tourist attraction in Africa and the most memorable moment for many visitors. In common parlance, the term "safari" refers to an excursion on the African land, particularly in the savanna, with the aim of witnessing the awe-inspiring spectacle of wild animals in their habitat. Some animals, such as elephants and giraffes, tend to approach cars and standard equipment allows you to observe them well. Lions, cheetahs and leopards are sometimes shy and you will see them better with binoculars. A walking safari (also called "bush walk", "footing" or "foot safari") consists of hiking, either for a few hours or for several days.
ref: "Safaris are perhaps the greatest tourism draw in Africa and the highlight for many visitors. The term safari in popular use refers to overland travel to view the stunning African wildlife, particularly on savanna. Some animals, such as elephants and giraffes, tend to approach closely to cars and standard equipment will allow good viewing. Lions, cheetahs and leopards are sometimes shy and you will see them better with binoculars. A walking safari (also called a ""bush walk"", ""hiking safari"", or going ""footing"") consists of hiking, either for a few hours or several days."

src: Les visites sont moins chères pour les grands groupes, donc si vous êtes seul ou avec un seul ami, essayez de rencontrer d’autres personnes et de former un groupe de quatre à six personnes pour obtenir un meilleur tarif par personne. Cependant, cela ne devrait pas trop vous inquiéter, car les touristes sont souvent mélangés pour remplir les voitures. Il semblerait qu'il s'agisse d'une façon de faire croire aux gens qu'ils doivent payer plus cher.
mt: Visits are cheaper for large groups, so if you are alone or with just one friend, try to meet other people and form a group of four to six people to get a better price per person. However, this should not worry you too much, as tourists are often mixed to fill the cars. It seems to be a way of making people think they have to pay more.
ref: Tours are cheaper for larger groups, so if you're by yourself or with just one friend, try to meet other people and form a group of four to six for a better per-person rate. However, this shouldn't really be off your concern, because often tourists are shuffled around to fill the cars. It seems actually to be more a way of tricking people into believing they have to pay more.

src: Le tourisme occupe une place importante dans l'économie de San Francisco en raison de sa renommée à l'international, mais dans le fond, ses activités économiques sont diversifiées. Les principaux secteurs d'emploi sont les services professionnels, le gouvernement, la finance, le commerce et le tourisme. Sa représentation fréquente dans la musique, les films, la littérature et la culture populaire a contribué à faire connaître la ville et ses monuments dans le monde entier. San Francisco a développé une grande infrastructure touristique avec de nombreux hôtels, restaurants et installations de congrès de premier ordre. San Francisco est aussi l'une des meilleures destinations du pays pour découvrir la cuisine asiatique : coréenne, thaï, indienne et japonaise.
mt: Tourism is an important part of the San Francisco economy, with an estimated nine million domestic visitors and members of the  international  community who spend $10.5 billion annually on hotels, meals and entertainment.  Museums and events such as the  San Francisco Jazz Festival  also contribute to the economies of  San Francisco  and  California.  The  tourism industry  generates about 140,000 jobs in the city and contributes $2.5 billion in taxes.  Many large hotels and startups are located in the city, which is a tourist destination all year.  The city's most popular tourist attractions include the  Golden Gate Bridge,  cable cars,  Alcatraz,  Chinatown,  Fisherman's Wharf,  Lombard Street,  Coit Tower,  Palace of Fine Arts,  Transamerica Pyramid,  City Hall,  and  Pier 39.  The  San Francisco  cable cars, the only surviving link to the 19th century, are among the few cable car systems in the world to still provide regular service.  The cable cars are among the most significant landmarks in  San Francisco, together with the city's  famous steep cable car hills.  Many people visit the city to take part in  San Francisco's  cultural events, including the  San Francisco International Film Festival,  the  San Francisco Jazz Festival,  and the  San Francisco Fringe Festival.  The  San Francisco International Film Festival  is the largest film festival in the United States and is one of the longest-running film festivals in the world.  The  San Francisco Fringe Festival  is the city's largest local theatre event, with over 1,000 local and international performers making up 50 productions.  The  San Francisco International Film Festival  is the largest film festival in the United States and is one of the longest-running film festivals in the world.  The  San Francisco Fringe Festival  is the city's largest local theatre event, with over 1,000 local and international performers making up 50 productions.  The  San Francisco International Film Festival  is the largest film festival in the United States and is one of the longest-running film festivals in the world.  The  San Francisco Fringe Festival  is the city's largest local theatre event, with over 1,000 local and international performers making up 50 productions.  The  San Francisco International Film Festival  is the largest film festival in the United States and is one of the longest-running film
ref: While San Francisco's economy is linked to it being a world-class tourist attraction, its economy is diversified. The largest employment sectors are professional services, government, finance, trade, and tourism. Its frequent portrayal in music, films, literature and popular culture has helped make the city and its landmarks known throughout the world. San Francisco has developed a large tourist infrastructure with numerous hotels, restaurants, and top-notch convention facilities. San Francisco is also one of the best places in the nation for other Asian cuisine: Korean, Thai, Indian, and Japanese.

src: La réservation à l'avance donne au voyageur la tranquillité d'esprit de savoir qu'il aura un endroit où dormir une fois arrivé à destination. Les agences de voyage ont souvent des accords avec des hôtels spécifiques, mais vous pouvez également réserver par l'intermédiaire d'agences de voyage d'autres types d'hébergement, comme des aires de camping. Les agences de voyage proposent généralement des forfaits comprenant le petit déjeuner, le service de transport depuis/vers l'aéroport ou même des forfaits combinant le vol et l'hébergement. Ils peuvent également retenir la réservation pour vous si vous avez besoin de temps pour réfléchir à l'offre ou vous procurer d'autres documents nécessaires pour votre destination (par exemple, un visa). Toute modification ou demande doit cependant être adressée à l’agence de voyages d’abord et non directement à l’hôtel.
mt: Advance booking gives the traveler the peace of mind of knowing that they will have a place to stay once they arrive at their destination. Travel agencies often have agreements with specific hotels, but you can also book through travel agencies other types of accommodation, such as camping areas. Travel agencies usually offer packages including breakfast, transport from/to the airport or even packages combining flight and accommodation. They can also hold the reservation for you if you need time to think about the offer or obtain other necessary documents for your destination (for example, a visa). Any modification or request must however be addressed to the travel agency first and not directly to the hotel.
ref: Booking in advance gives the traveller peace of mind that they will have somewhere to sleep once they arrive at their destination. Travel agents often have deals with specific hotels, although you may find it possible to book other forms of accommodation, like camping grounds, through a travel agent. Travel agents usually offer packages that include breakfast, transportation arrangements to/from the airport or even combined flight and hotel packages. They can also hold the reservation for you if you need time to think about the offer or procure other documents for your destination (e.g. visa). Any amendments or requests though should be coursed through the travel agent first and not directly with the hotel.

src: La réservation à l'avance donne au voyageur la tranquillité d'esprit de savoir qu'il aura un endroit où dormir une fois arrivé à destination. Les agences de voyage ont souvent des accords avec des hôtels spécifiques, mais vous pouvez également réserver par l'intermédiaire d'agences de voyage d'autres types d'hébergement, comme des aires de camping. Les agences de voyage proposent généralement des forfaits comprenant le petit déjeuner, le service de transport depuis/vers l'aéroport ou même des forfaits combinant le vol et l'hébergement. Ils peuvent également retenir la réservation pour vous si vous avez besoin de temps pour réfléchir à l'offre ou vous procurer d'autres documents nécessaires pour votre destination (par exemple, un visa). Toute modification ou demande doit cependant être adressée à l’agence de voyages d’abord et non directement à l’hôtel.
mt: Advance booking gives the traveler the peace of mind of knowing that they will have a place to stay once they arrive at their destination. Travel agencies often have agreements with specific hotels, but you can also book through travel agencies other types of accommodation, such as camping areas. Travel agencies usually offer packages including breakfast, transport from/to the airport or even packages combining flight and accommodation. They can also hold the reservation for you if you need time to think about the offer or obtain other necessary documents for your destination (for example, a visa). Any modification or request must however be addressed to the travel agency first and not directly to the hotel.

src: Les applications de traduction en temps réel sont des applis capable de traduire automatiquement des segments entiers de texte, ceci d'une langue vers une autre. Certaines des applications de cette catégorie peuvent même traduire des textes en langue étrangère inscrits sur des panneaux ou d'autres objets du quotidien lorsque l'utilisateur pointe son smartphone vers eux. Les moteurs de traduction se sont considérablement améliorés, et donnent maintenant souvent des traductions plus ou moins correctes (et plus rarement du charabia), mais il faut faire attention, car ils ont peut-être encore tout faux. L'une des applications les plus réputées dans cette catégorie est Google Translate, qui permet de traduire hors ligne après avoir téléchargé les données linguistiques souhaitées.
mt: Real-time translation apps are apps capable of automatically translating entire segments of text, from one language to another. Some of these apps can even translate foreign language text inscribed on signs or other everyday objects when the user points their smartphone at them. Translation engines have greatly improved, and now often give translations that are more or less correct (and more rarely gibberish), but one must be careful, as they may still be completely wrong. One of the most well-known apps in this category is Google Translate, which allows offline translation after downloading the desired language data.
ref: Real-time text translator apps – applications that are capable of automatically translating whole segments of text from one language into another. Some of the applications in this category can even translate texts in foreign languages on signs or other objects in the real world when the user points the smartphone towards those objects. The translation engines have improved dramatically, and now often give more or less correct translations (and more seldom gibberish), but some care is due, as they still may have gotten it all wrong. One of the most prominent apps in this category is Google Translate, which allows offline translation after downloading the desired language data.

src: Les avalanches ne sont pas des phénomènes anormaux ; les pentes escarpées ne peuvent retenir qu'une petite quantité de neige, dont l'excédent se répand sous forme d'avalanche. Le problème est que la neige colle, alors si elle s'effondre, c'est qu'il y a eu un élément déclencheur. Or, un léger effondrement de la neige peut être le déclencheur pour tout le reste. Parfois, l'élément déclencheur est le réchauffement solaire sur la neige, parfois c'est juste davantage de neige, et d'autres fois il peut s'agir d'événements naturels ou de l'activité humaine.
mt: Avalanches are not abnormal phenomena; steep slopes can only hold a small amount of snow, with the excess spreading as an avalanche. The problem is that snow sticks, so if it collapses, there was a triggering element. A slight snow collapse can be the trigger for the rest. Sometimes the triggering element is solar heating on the snow, sometimes it's just more snow, and other times it can be natural events or human activity.
ref: Avalanches are not an abnormality; steep slopes can hold only so much slow, and the excess volumes will come down as avalanches. The problem is that snow is sticky, so it needs some triggering to come down, and some snow coming down can be the triggering event for the rest. Sometimes the original trigging event is the sun warming the snow, sometimes some more snowfall, sometimes other natural events, often a human.

src: Un curry est un plat à base d'herbes et d'épices, accompagné de viande ou de légumes. Un plat au curry peut être « solide » ou « liquide », selon la quantité de sauce qu'il contient. Dans les régions intérieures du nord de l'Inde et du Pakistan, le yaourt est couramment utilisé dans les currys ; dans le sud de l'Inde et certaines autres régions côtières du sous-continent, le lait de coco est couramment utilisé.
mt: A curry is a dish made with herbs and spices, served with meat or vegetables. A curry can be "solid" or "liquid", depending on the amount of sauce it contains. In the interior regions of northern India and Pakistan, yogurt is commonly used in curries; in southern India and some other coastal regions of the subcontinent, coconut milk is commonly used.
ref: "A curry is a dish based on herbs and spices, together with either meat or vegetables. A curry can be either ""dry"" or ""wet"" depending on the amount of liquid. In inland regions of Northern India and Pakistan, yogurt is commonly used in curries; in Southern India and some other coastal regions of the subcontinent, coconut milk is commonly used."

src: L'autoroute du pôle Sud est une route de 1 600 km entre la station de McMurdo, au bord de la mer de Ross, et le pôle. Il s'agit de neige compactée, avec des crevasses comblées et marquées par des fanions. Il ne peut être parcouru que par des tracteurs spécialisés, tirant des traîneaux transportant carburant et fournitures. Ces derniers ne sont pas très agiles, de sorte que la piste doit faire une longue embardée autour des montagnes transantarctiques pour arriver sur le plateau.
mt: 1,600 km long, the South Pole Highway is a road between McMurdo Station on the Ross Sea and the South Pole. It is compacted snow, with crevasses filled and marked by flags. It can only be traversed by specialized tractors pulling sleds carrying fuel and supplies. These are not very agile, so the road must make a long detour around the Transantarctic Mountains to reach the plateau.
ref: The South Pole Traverse (or Highway) is a 1600 km trail from McMurdo Station on the Ross Sea to the Pole. It's compacted snow with crevasses filled in and marked by flags. It can only be traveled by specialized tractors, hauling sleds with fuel and supplies. These aren't very nimble so the trail has to take a long swerve around the Transantarctic Mountains to come onto the plateau.

src: Entrer en Afrique australe en voiture est un moyen incroyable de voir toute la beauté de la région, aussi bien que pour se rendre à des endroits hors des routes touristiques normales. Cela peut se faire dans une voiture normale avec une planification minutieuse, mais un 4x4 est fortement conseillé et de nombreux endroits ne sont accessibles qu'avec un 4x4 à empattement long. Lors de la planification, gardez à l’esprit que, bien que l’Afrique australe soit stable, tous les pays voisins ne le sont pas. Les obligations de visa et les frais afférents varient d'un pays à l'autre, et dépendent du pays d'où vous venez. Chaque pays a également des lois uniques exigeant quels produits de premier secours doivent être dans la voiture.
mt: Entering southern Africa by car is an incredible way to see the beauty of the region, as well as to get to places off the beaten track. This can be done in a normal car with careful planning, but a 4x4 is highly recommended and many places are only accessible with a long wheelbase 4x4. When planning, keep in mind that, although southern Africa is stable, not all neighbouring countries are. Visa requirements and fees vary from country to country, and depend on your country of origin. Each country also has unique laws requiring what first aid supplies must be in the car.
ref: Entering Southern Africa by car is an amazing way to see all the region's beauty as well as to get to places off the normal tourist routes. This can be done in a normal car with careful planning but a 4x4 is highly advised and many locations are only accessible with a high wheel base 4x4. Keep in mind while planning that although Southern Africa is stable not all neighboring countries are. Visa requirements and costs vary from nation to nation and are affected by the country you come from. Each country also has unique laws requiring what emergency items need to be in the car.

src: Porter pour les autres – ne perdez jamais vos sacs de vue, surtout lorsque vous traversez des frontières internationales. Quelqu'un pourrait se servir de vous pour transporter de la drogue à votre insu, ce qui vous attirerait de gros ennuis. Cela inclut l'attente en ligne, car les chiens renifleurs de drogue peuvent être utilisés à tout moment sans préavis. Dans certains pays, les sanctions sont extrêmement draconiennes, même pour les premières infractions ; elles peuvent aller jusqu'à des peines de prison de plus de dix ans ou la peine de mort. Les sacs sans surveillance sont une cible pour le vol et peuvent également attirer l'attention des autorités qui se méfient des alertes à la bombe.
mt: Carry for others – never lose sight of your bags, especially when crossing international borders. Someone could use you to transport drugs without your knowledge, which would get you in big trouble. This includes waiting in line, as drug-sniffing dogs can be used at any time without warning. In some countries, penalties are extremely draconian, even for first offenses; they can go up to sentences of more than ten years or the death penalty. Unattended bags are a target for theft and can also attract the attention of authorities who are suspicious of bomb threats.
ref: Carrying for others - Never let your bags out of your sight, especially when you are crossing international borders. You could find yourself being used as a drug carrier without your knowledge, which will land you in a great deal of trouble. This includes waiting in line, as drug-sniffing dogs could be used at any time without notice. Some countries have exceedingly draconian punishments even for first time offenses; these can include prison sentences of over 10 years or death. Unattended bags are a target for theft and can also attract attention from authorities wary of bomb threats.

src: Emplissez votre maison avec l'arôme d'un café intense le matin et le soir, avec celui d'une relaxante tisane à la camomille. Lorsque vous êtes en séjour, vous avez le temps de vous faire plaisir et de prendre quelques minutes supplémentaires pour préparer quelque chose de spécial. Si vous vous sentez d'humeur plus aventureuse, profitez de l'occasion pour préparer un jus ou mélanger des smoothies : peut-être découvrirez-vous une boisson simple que vous pourrez préparer pour votre petit déjeuner lorsque vous retournerez à votre routine quotidienne. Si vous vivez dans une ville où la culture de la boisson est variée, allez dans les bars ou les pubs des quartiers que vous ne fréquentez pas.
mt: Fill your home with the aroma of a strong coffee in the morning and evening, with that of a relaxing chamomile tea. When you are on vacation, you have the time to treat yourself and take a few extra minutes to prepare something special. If you are feeling more adventurous, take advantage of the opportunity to prepare a juice or mix smoothies: maybe you will discover a simple drink that you can prepare for your breakfast when you return to your daily routine. If you live in a city where the beverage culture is varied, go to the bars or pubs in neighborhoods that you do not frequent.
ref: Fill your home with a rich coffee in the morning and some relaxing chamomile tea at night. When you're on a staycation, you have the time to treat yourself and take a few extra minutes to brew up something special. If you're feeling more adventurous, take the opportunity to juice or blend up some smoothies: maybe you'll discover a simple beverage that you can make for breakfast when you're back to your daily routine. If you live in a city with a varied drinking culture, go to bars or pubs in neighborhoods you don't frequent.

src: Le village de Haldarsvík offre des vues sur l’île voisine d’Eysturoy et abrite une église octogonale inhabituelle. Dans le cimetière, on trouve d'intéressantes sculptures en marbre représentant des colombes sur certaines tombes. Cela vaut la peine de se promener pendant une demi-heure dans ce village fascinant.
mt: The village of Haldarsvík offers views of the neighboring island of Eysturoy and houses an unusual octagonal church. In the cemetery, there are interesting marble sculptures of doves on some graves. It is worth walking for half an hour in this fascinating village.
ref: The village of Haldarsvík offer views of the nearby island Eysturoy and has an unusual octagonal church. In the churchyard, there are interesting marble sculptures of doves over some tombs. It's worth half an hour to stroll about the intriguing village.

src: Si vous n’avez pas besoin de visa pour des séjours de courte durée dans certains pays en tant que touriste ou pour le voyage d'affaires, le fait d’y aller en tant qu’étudiant étranger nécessite généralement un séjour plus long que celui d’un simple touriste. En général, pour séjourner dans un pays étranger sur une longue période, vous devez obtenir au préalable un visa. Les procédures de demande et exigences en matière de visas étudiants sont généralement différentes de celles des visas standard de tourisme ou d'affaires. Pour la plupart des pays, vous aurez besoin d’une lettre d'acceptation de l’établissement dans lequel vous souhaitez étudier, ainsi que d’une preuve de fonds suffisants pour subvenir à vos besoins au moins pendant la première année de votre cursus. Pour le détail des conditions, voyez auprès de l’établissement ainsi que du service d’immigration du pays dans lequel vous souhaitez étudier.
mt: If you don't need a visa for short stays in some countries as a tourist or for business, going as a foreign student usually requires a longer stay than a simple tourist. In general, to stay in a foreign country for a long period, you must first obtain a visa. The procedures for requesting and visa requirements for student visas are usually different from those of standard tourist or business visas. For most countries, you will need an acceptance letter from the institution you wish to study at, as well as proof of sufficient funds to meet your needs at least for the first year of your course. For details of the conditions, see the institution and the immigration service of the country in which you wish to study.
ref: While you may not need a visa for short visits to certain countries as a tourist or for business, going there as an international student generally requires a longer stay than going there just as a casual tourist. In general, staying in any foreign country for an extended period of time will require you to obtain a visa in advance. Student visas generally have different requirements and application procedures from normal tourist or business visas. For most countries, you will need an offer letter from the institution you wish to study at, and also evidence of funds to support yourself for at least the first year of your course. Check with the institution, as well as the immigration department for the country you wish to study in for detailed requirements.

src: C'est surtout en été qu'il vous faudra faire attention aux moustiques si vous comptez faire de la randonnée en forêt tropicale. Même si vous conduisez dans la forêt tropicale, quelques secondes avec les portes ouvertes pendant que vous montez dans le véhicule suffisent pour que les moustiques montent dans le véhicule avec vous.
mt: It's especially in summer that you'll need to be careful of mosquitoes if you plan to hike in tropical forests. Even if you drive in a tropical forest, a few seconds with the doors open while you get into the vehicle is enough for the mosquitoes to get into the vehicle with you.
ref: In summer, especially, you'll need to watch out for mosquitoes if you decide to hike through the rainforest. Even if you're driving through the subtropical rainforest, a few seconds with the doors open while you get inside the vehicle is enough time for mosquitoes to get in the vehicle with you.

src: Les Sundarbans sont la plus grande ceinture de mangroves côtières du monde, s’étendant sur 80 km (50 miles) depuis la côte jusqu’à l’arrière-pays bangladais et indien. Les Sundarbans ont été déclarés site du patrimoine mondial de l'UNESCO. La partie de la forêt située sur le territoire indien est appelée parc national des Sundarbans. Les forêts ne sont cependant pas composées uniquement de marais de mangroves : elles recèlent également certains des derniers vestiges des jungles majestueuses qui recouvraient autrefois la plaine du Gange. Les Sundarbans couvrent une superficie de 3 850 km², dont environ un tiers est couvert de zones d’eau/marécages. Sundarbans est une réserve naturelle depuis 1966, vous pourrez y trouver environ 400 tigres du Bengale royal et 30 000 cerfs tachetés.
mt: The Sundarbans are the largest coastal mangrove forest in the world, extending over 80 km (50 miles) from the coast into the Bangladeshi and Indian hinterland. The Sundarbans have been declared a UNESCO World Heritage Site. The Indian part of the forest is called the Sundarbans National Park. The forests are not, however, composed solely of mangrove swamps: they also contain some of the last remnants of the majestic jungles that once covered the Ganges plain. The Sundarbans cover an area of 3,850 km², of which about one third is covered by water/marshes. Sundarbans has been a nature reserve since 1966, and you can find about 400 Bengal tigers and 30,000 spotted deer there.
ref: The Sundarbans are the largest littoral mangrove belt in the world, stretching 80 km (50 mi) into the Bangladeshi and Indian hinterland from the coast. The Sundarbans has been declared a UNESCO World Heritage Site. The part of the forest within Indian territory is called Sundarbans National Park. The forests aren't just mangrove swamps though — they include some of the last remaining stands of the mighty jungles which once covered the Gangetic plain. The Sundarbans cover an area of 3,850 km², of which about one-third is covered in water/marsh areas. Since 1966 the Sundarbans have been a wildlife sanctuary, and it is estimated that there are now 400 Royal Bengal tigers and about 30,000 spotted deer in the area.

src: Le monde compte plus de 5000 langues différentes, dont une vingtaine avec 50 millions de locuteurs ou plus. Les mots écrits sont également souvent plus faciles à comprendre que les mots prononcés. C'est particulièrement vrai pour les adresses, qui sont souvent difficiles à prononcer de manière compréhensible. De nombreuses nations, dans leur ensemble, parlent couramment l'anglais, et dans bien d'autres pays, on peut s'attendre à en trouver une connaissance partielle, surtout chez les jeunes. Imaginez, si vous le voulez bien, un habitant de Manchester, un habitant de Boston, un Jamaïcain et un habitant de Sydney, assis autour d’une même table de restaurant à Toronto. Ils se régalent les uns les autres d’histoires de leurs villes natales, racontées avec leurs accents prononcés et leur argot local.
mt: The world has over 5000 different languages, with twenty or more with 50 million speakers or more. Written words are also often easier to understand than spoken words. This is particularly true for addresses, which are often difficult to pronounce in a way that is easily understood. Many nations, as a whole, speak English fluently, and in many other countries, one can expect to find some knowledge of it, especially among the young. Imagine, if you will, a native of Manchester, a native of Boston, a Jamaican, and a native of Sydney, seated around the same table in a restaurant in Toronto. They regale each other with stories of their hometowns, told with their accents and local slang.
ref: The world has over 5,000 different languages, including more than twenty with 50 million or more speakers. Written words are often easier to understand than spoken words, also. This is especially true of addresses, which are often difficult to pronounce intelligibly. Many entire nations are completely fluent in English, and in even more you can expect a limited knowledge - especially among younger people. Imagine, if you will, a Mancunian, Bostonian, Jamaican and Sydneysider sitting around a table having dinner at a restaurant in Toronto. They're regaling each other with stories from their hometowns, told in their distinct accents and local argot.

src: Les bus partent de la gare routière interdistricts (située sur l'autre rive) tout au long de la journée, mais la plupart, tout particulièrement ceux qui desservent l'est et Jakar/Bumthang, partent entre 6 h 30 et 7 h 30 du matin. Les bus inter-districts sont souvent complets, aussi est-il conseillé d'acheter un ticket quelques jours à l'avance. La plupart des districts sont desservis par de petits caboteurs japonais, qui sont confortables et robustes. Les taxis collectifs sont un moyen rapide et confortable de se rendre dans des endroits proches, tels que Paro (150 Nu) et Punakha (200 Nu).
mt: Interdistrict buses leave the interdistrict bus station (on the other side of the river) throughout the day, but most, especially those serving the east and Jakar/Bumthang, leave between 6:30 and 7:30 in the morning. Inter-district buses are often full, so it is advisable to buy a ticket a few days in advance. Most districts are served by small Japanese cabs, which are comfortable and sturdy. Shared taxis are a quick and comfortable way to get to nearby places, such as Paro (150 Nu) and Punakha (200 Nu).
ref: Buses depart the inter-district bus station (across the river) throughout the day, though most, especially those heading to the east and Jakar/Bumthang leave between 06:30 and 07:30. As the inter-district buses are often full, it is advisable to purchase a ticket a few days in advance. Most districts are served by small Japanese Coaster Buses, which are comfortable and sturdy. Shared taxis are a quick and comfortable means to travel to nearby places, such as Paro (Nu 150) and Punakha (Nu 200).

src: Combiné à sa relative inaccessibilité, « Tombouctou » est devenu une métaphore pour les pays lointains et exotiques. Aujourd’hui, Tombouctou est une ville pauvre, bien que sa réputation en fasse une attraction touristique, et elle dispose d’un aéroport. En 1990, il a été ajouté à la liste des sites du patrimoine mondial en danger, en raison de la menace des sables du désert. C'était l'une des principales étapes de l'émission « Wonders of the African World » de Henry Louis Gates sur le PBS. La ville contraste fortement avec les cités du reste du pays, car elle possède un style davantage arabe qu'africain.
mt: Combined with its relative inaccessibility, "Timbuktu" has become a metaphor for faraway and exotic places. Today, Timbuktu is a poor city, though its reputation makes it a tourist attraction, and it has an airport. In 1990, it was added to the list of World Heritage Sites in danger, due to the threat of desert sand. It was one of the main stops of the PBS show "Wonders of the African World" by Henry Louis Gates. The city contrasts sharply with the cities of the rest of the country, as it has a style more Arab than African.
ref: "Combined with its relative inaccessibility, ""Timbuktu"" has come to be used as a metaphor for exotic, distant lands. Today, Timbuktu is an impoverished town, although its reputation makes it a tourist attraction, and it has an airport. In 1990, it was added to the list of world heritage sites in danger, due to the threat of desert sands. It was one of the major stops during Henry Louis Gates' PBS special Wonders of the African World. The city is in stark contrast to the rest of the country's cities, because it has more of an Arabic flair than of an African."

src: Les paralympiques se tiendront du 24 août au 5 septembre 2021. Certains événements se tiendront dans d’autres localisations à travers le Japon. Tokyo sera la seule ville asiatique à avoir accueilli deux Jeux olympiques d'été, après avoir accueilli les Jeux en 1964. Si vous avez réservé vos vols et votre hébergement en 2020 avant l'annonce du report, vous risquez d'être confronté à une situation délicate. Les politiques d'annulation varient, mais à partir de fin mars, la plupart des politiques d'annulation basées sur les coronavirus ne s'étendent pas jusqu'en juillet 2020, date à laquelle les Jeux olympiques avaient été prévus. On s'attend à ce que la plupart des billets d'événements coûtent entre 2 500 et 130 000 yens, les billets typiques coûtant environ 7 000 yens.
mt: 2020 Summer Paralympics will be held from August 24 to September 5, 2021. Some events will be held in other locations across Japan. Tokyo will be the only Asian city to have hosted two Summer Olympics, after hosting the Games in 1964. If you have booked your flights and accommodation in 2020 before the announcement of the postponement, you may be faced with a difficult situation. Cancellation policies vary, but from late March, most coronavirus-based cancellation policies do not extend to July 2020, the date the Olympics were scheduled to be held. It is expected that most event tickets will cost between 2,500 and 130,000 yen, typical tickets costing about 7,000 yen.
ref: The Paralympics will take place from 24 August to 5 September 2021. Some events will be held in other locations throughout Japan. Tokyo will be the only Asian city to have hosted two summer Olympics, having hosted the games in 1964. If you booked your flights and accommodation for 2020 before the postponement was announced, you may have a tricky situation. Cancellation policies vary, but as of late March most coronavirus-based cancellation policies don't extend to July 2020, when the Olympics had been scheduled. It's expected that most event tickets will cost between ¥2,500 and ¥130,000, with typical tickets costing around ¥7,000.

src: Une tornade est un tourbillon d'air à basse-pression en forme de colonne, l'air alentour est aspiré vers l'intérieur et le haut. Ils génèrent des vents violents (souvent de 100 à 200 miles/heure) et peuvent soulever des objets lourds dans les airs, les transportant au fur et à mesure que la tornade se déplace. Elles commencent comme des entonnoirs descendant des nuages orageux, et deviennent des « tornades » lorsqu’elles touchent terre.
mt: A tornado is a low-pressure columnar vortex (usually precipitation induced) that is in contact with both the surface and the cloud base. Tornadoes produce damaging winds, debris, and can produce large hail. They usually start as funnels coming down from the clouds, and become « tornadoes » when they touch the ground.
ref: "A tornado is a spinning column of very low-pressure air, which sucks the surrounding air inward and upward. They generate high winds (often 100-200 miles/hour) and can lift heavy objects into the air, carrying them as the tornado moves. They begin as funnels descending from storm clouds, and become ""tornadoes"" when they touch the ground."

src: Si le pays dans lequel vous vous rendez fait l'objet d'un avertissement aux voyageurs émis par votre gouvernement, votre assurance santé à l'étranger ou votre assurance annulation voyage peuvent en être affectées. Vous pouvez également avoir recours aux conseils d'autres gouvernements que le vôtre, mais leurs conseils sont adaptés à leurs citoyens. Comme exemple, les citoyens américains au Moyen-Orient pourraient être confrontés à des situations différentes de celles des Européens ou des Arabes. Les avis ne sont qu'un bref résumé de la situation politique d'un pays. Les opinions présentées sont souvent superficielles, générales et trop simplifiées par rapport aux informations plus détaillées disponibles ailleurs.
mt: If the country you are visiting is under a travel advisory issued by your government, your foreign health insurance or your trip cancellation insurance may be affected. You may also seek advice from other governments than your own, but their advice is tailored to their citizens. For example, American citizens in the Middle East may be faced with different situations than Europeans or Arabs. The advice is often a superficial summary of the political situation of a country. The opinions presented are often superficial, general and too simplified compared to the more detailed information available elsewhere.
ref: If the country you will be visiting becomes subject to a travel advisory, your travel health insurance or your trip cancellation insurance may be affected. You may also wish to consult the advice of governments other than your own, but their advice is designed for their citizens. As one example, American citizens in the Middle East might face different situations from Europeans or Arabs. Advisories are merely a brief summary of the political situation in one country. The views presented are often cursory, general and oversimplified compared to the more detailed information available elsewhere.

src: Les agences de voyage existent depuis le XIXe siècle. Un voyagiste est généralement une bonne option pour un périple qui dépasse le cadre des expériences précédentes du voyageur en matière de nature, culture, langue, ou pays à faible revenu. Bien que la plupart des agences soient disposées à prendre en charge la plupart des réservations régulières, de nombreux agents sont spécialisés dans des types de voyages, des gammes de prix ou des destinations plus spécifiques. Il peut être préférable de faire appel à un agent qui réserve fréquemment des voyages similaires au vôtre. Jetez un coup d’œil aux voyages dont l’agent fait la promotion, que ce soit sur un site internet ou en vitrine.
mt: Travel agencies have existed since the 19th century. A travel agent is generally a good option for a trip that goes beyond the traveler's previous experiences in terms of nature, culture, language, or low-income country. While most agencies are willing to handle most regular reservations, many agents specialize in types of travel, price ranges, or more specific destinations. It may be preferable to call on an agent who books frequently similar trips to yours. Take a look at the trips the agent is promoting, whether on a website or in a storefront.
ref: Travel agencies have been around since the 19th century. A travel agent is usually a good option for a journey which extends beyond a traveller's previous experience of nature, culture, language or low-income countries. Although most agencies are willing to take on most regular bookings, many agents specialise in particular types of travel, budget ranges or destinations. It can be better to use an agent who frequently books similar trips to yours. Take a look at what trips the agent is promoting, whether on a website or in a shop window.

src: Il y a de nombreuses choses à prendre en considération avant et pendant que vous voyagez. Lorsque vous voyagez, attendez-vous à ce que les choses ne soient pas comme « chez vous ». Les manières, les lois, la nourriture, la circulation, le logement, les normes, la langue, etc. diffèrent dans une certaine mesure de l’endroit où vous vivez. C'est quelque chose que vous devez toujours garder à l'esprit pour éviter toute déception ou peut-être même toute aversion à l'égard des comportements locaux.
mt: There are many things to consider before and during your travels. When you travel, expect things not to be like "at home". Manners, laws, food, traffic, lodging, norms, language, etc. differ to some extent from where you live. This is something you should always keep in mind to avoid any disappointment or perhaps even aversion to local behaviors.
ref: "There are many things you have to take into consideration before and when you travel somewhere. When you travel, expect things not to be like they are ""back home"". Manners, laws, food, traffic, lodging, standards, language and so on will to some extent differ from where you live. This is something you always need to keep in mind, to avoid disappointment or perhaps even distaste over local ways to do things."

C'est quelque chose que vous devez toujours garder à l'esprit pour éviter toute déception ou peut-être même toute aversion à l'égard des comportements locaux.
mt: There are many things to consider before and during your travels. When you travel, expect things not to be like "at home". Manners, laws, food, traffic, lodging, norms, language, etc. differ to some extent from where you live. This is something you should always keep in mind to avoid any disappointment or perhaps even aversion to local behaviors.
ref: "There are many things you have to take into consideration before and when you travel somewhere. When you travel, expect things not to be like they are ""back home"". Manners, laws, food, traffic, lodging, standards, language and so on will to some extent differ from where you live. This is something you always need to keep in mind, to avoid disappointment or perhaps even distaste over local ways to do things."

src: Si vous voyagez pour la première fois dans un pays en voie de développement ou dans une région du monde que vous ne connaissez pas, ne prenez pas le possible choc culturel à le légère. Nombreux sont les voyageurs stables et compétents qui ont été dépassés par la nouveauté des voyages dans les pays en développement, où de nombreux petits ajustements culturels peuvent vite s'accumuler. Surtout au début, pensez à faire des folies dans les hôtels, la nourriture et les services de style et de qualité occidentaux pour vous aider à vous acclimater. Ne dormez pas sur un matelas ou sur un coussin à même le sol dans les zones où vous ne connaissez pas la faune locale. Si vous allez camper, apportez un lit de camp ou un hamac pour vous tenir à l'écart des serpents, scorpions et autres.
mt: If you are traveling to a developing country or a region of the world you are unfamiliar with for the first time, don't take the cultural shock lightly. Many stable and competent travelers have been overwhelmed by the novelty of travel in developing countries, where many small cultural adjustments can quickly pile up. Especially at first, think about indulging in Western-style hotels, food, and services for a while to help you acclimate. Don't sleep on a mattress or pillow directly on the ground in areas where you are unfamiliar with the local fauna. If you are camping, bring a sleeping bag or hammock to keep away from snakes, scorpions, and other things.
ref: If traveling in a developing country for the first time – or in a new part of the world – don't underestimate the potential culture shock. Many a stable, capable traveler has been overcome by the newness of developing world travel, where many little cultural adjustments can add up quickly. Especially in your initial days, consider splurging on Western-style and -quality hotels, food, and services to help acclimatize. Do not sleep on a mattress or pad on the ground in areas where you do not know the local fauna. If you are going to camp out, bring a camp cot or hammock to keep you away from snakes, scorpions and such.

src: Faites des copies de votre police d'assurance et des coordonnées de votre assureur et emportez-les avec vous. Ils doivent présenter l'adresse e-mail et les numéros de téléphone internationaux de l'assureur pour obtenir des conseils/autorisations et effectuer les demandes d'indemnisation. Ayez à disposition une autre copie dans vos bagages et en ligne (e-mail adressé à vous-même avec pièce jointe, ou stocké dans le « cloud »). Si vous voyagez avec un ordinateur portable ou une tablette, conservez une copie dans sa mémoire ou son disque (accessibles hors connexion). Donnez également des exemplaires de la réglementation et des contacts aux compagnons de voyage et aux parents ou amis à la maison qui sont prêts à vous aider.
mt: 1. Make copies of your insurance policy and your insurer's contact details and take them with you. They should provide the insurer's email address and international phone numbers for advice/authorisation and to make claims. Have another copy in your luggage and online (email to yourself with attachment, or stored in the "cloud"). If you are travelling with a laptop or tablet, keep a copy in its memory or disk (accessible offline). Also give copies of the regulations and contacts to fellow travellers and parents or friends at home who are ready to help you.
ref: "Make and carry copies of your policy and your insurer's contact details with you. They need to show the insurer's e-mail address and international phone numbers for advice/authorizations and making claims. Have another copy in your luggage and online (e-mail to yourself with attachment, or stored in the ""cloud""). If traveling with a laptop or tablet, store a copy in its memory or disc (accessible without the internet). Also give policy/contact copies to traveling companions and relatives or friends back home willing to help."

src: Il existe de nombreux formats de films différents qui ont été utilisés au fil des ans. Le film standard 35 mm (négatif 36 par 24 mm) est de loin le plus courant. Il peut généralement être réapprovisionné assez facilement en cas d'épuisement et offre une résolution à peu près comparable à celle d'un reflex numérique actuel. Certaines caméras de moyen format utilisent un format de 6 par 6 cm, plus précisément un négatif de 56 par 56 mm. Cela donne une résolution presque quatre fois supérieure à celle d'un négatif de 35 mm (3136 mm2 contre 864).
mt: 35mm film is by far the most common. It can usually be replenished fairly easily in case of exhaustion and offers a resolution roughly comparable to that of a modern DSLR. Some medium format cameras use a 6 by 6 cm format, more precisely a negative of 56 by 56 mm. This gives a resolution almost four times greater than that of a 35 mm negative (3136 mm2 against 864).
ref: There are many different film formats that have been used over the years. Standard 35 mm film (36 by 24 mm negative) is much the commonest. It can usually be replenished fairly easily if you run out, and gives resolution roughly comparable to a current DSLR. Some medium-format film cameras use a 6 by 6 cm format, more precisely a 56 by 56 mm negative. This gives resolution almost four times that of a 35 mm negative (3136 mm2 versus 864).

src: Le moyen le plus simple de se lancer dans la rédaction d’articles de voyage est de se perfectionner sur un blogue de voyage bien établi. Après, et seulement après avoir maîtrisé le formatage et la révision en ligne, vous pourrez créer votre propre site internet.
mt: The easiest way to get started writing travel articles is to hone your skills on an established travel blog. After that, and only after you have mastered formatting and online editing, you can create your own website.
ref: The easiest way to get started in the business of travel writing is to hone your skills on an established travel blog website. After you become comfortable with formatting and editing on the web, then later, you might create your own website.

src: Le moyen le plus simple de se lancer dans la rédaction d’articles de voyage est de se perfectionner sur un blogue de voyage bien établi. Après, et seulement après avoir maîtrisé le formatage et la révision en ligne, vous pourrez créer votre propre site internet.
mt: The easiest way to get started writing travel articles is to hone your skills on an established travel blog. After that, and only after you have mastered formatting and online editing, you can create your own website.
ref: The easiest way to get started in the business of travel writing is to hone your skills on an established travel blog website. After you become comfortable with formatting and editing on the web, then later, you might create your own website.

src: À la maison, en raison de cette exposition constante aux germes locaux, les chances sont très élevées que vous soyez déjà immunisé contre eux. Mais dans d'autres parties du monde, où la faune bactériologique est nouvelle pour vous, vous risquez bien plus de rencontrer des problèmes. De plus, dans les climats plus chauds, les bactéries se développent plus rapidement et survivent plus longtemps à l'extérieur du corps. Ainsi les fléaux de Delhi Belly, la malédiction du pharaon, la vengeance de Montezuma et leurs nombreux amis. Comme pour les problèmes respiratoires dans les climats plus froids, les problèmes intestinaux dans les climats chauds sont assez courants et, dans la plupart des cas, sont particulièrement gênants mais pas vraiment dangereux.
mt: At home, because of this constant exposure to local germs, the chances are very high that you are already immune to them. But in other parts of the world, where the bacterial fauna is new to you, you are much more likely to encounter problems. Furthermore, in warmer climates, bacteria grow faster and survive longer outside the body. Thus the scourges of Delhi Belly, the curse of the pharaoh, the revenge of Montezuma and their many friends. As with respiratory problems in colder climates, intestinal problems in warmer climates are fairly common and, in most cases, are particularly annoying but not really dangerous.
ref: At home, due to this constant exposure to the local germs, odds are very high that you're already immune to them. But in other parts of the world, where the bacteriological fauna are new to you, you're far more likely to run into problems. Also, in warmer climates bacteria both grow more quickly and survive longer outside the body. Thus the scourges of Delhi Belly, the Pharaoh's Curse, Montezuma's Revenge, and their many friends. As with respiratory problems in colder climates, intestinal problems in hot climates are fairly common and in most cases are distinctly annoying but not really dangerous.

src: L'Europe est un continent relativement petit, mais comportant de nombreux pays indépendants. Dans des circonstances classiques, voyager à travers plusieurs pays implique donc de devoir procéder à plusieurs demandes de visa et de subir plusieurs vérifications de passeport. L’espace Schengen, cependant, fonctionne un peu comme un seul pays à cet égard. Tant que vous restez dans cette zone, vous pouvez généralement traverser les frontières sans repasser par les points de contrôle des passeports. De même, en ayant un visa Schengen, vous n'avez pas besoin de demander séparément un visa pour chacun des pays membres de l'espace, ce qui permet d'économiser du temps, de l'argent et des formalités administratives.
mt: Europe is a relatively small continent, but containing many independent countries. In classic circumstances, travelling through several countries would thus require several visa requests and passport checks. The Schengen area, however, works a bit like one country in this regard. As long as you stay within this zone, you can generally cross borders without going through passport checkpoints. Likewise, having a Schengen visa, you do not need to request separately a visa for each of the member countries of the space, which allows saving time, money and administrative formalities.
ref: Europe is a continent that is relatively small but with many independent countries. Under normal circumstances, travelling through multiple countries would mean having to go through visa applications and passport control multiple times. The Schengen zone, however, works somewhat like one country in this respect. As long as you stay in this zone, you can generally cross borders without going through passport control checkpoints again. Similarly, by having a Schengen visa, you do not need to apply for visas to each of the Schengen member countries separately, hence saving time, money and paperwork.

src: Le tombeau de Toutankhamon (KV62). KV62 est peut-être la plus célèbre des tombes de la vallée, le lieu où Howard Carter a découvert en 1922 la sépulture royale presque intacte du jeune roi. Cependant, comparé à la plupart des autres tombes royales, le tombeau de Toutankhamon ne vaut guère la peine d'être visité, étant beaucoup plus petit et avec une décoration limitée. Toute personne souhaitant voir les traces des dommages causés à la momie lors des tentatives de la retirer du cercueil sera déçue car seules la tête et les épaules sont visibles. Les fabuleuses richesses du tombeau n’y sont plus présentes, mais ont été transférées au musée égyptien du Caire. Les visiteurs dont le temps est limité feraient mieux d'aller le passer ailleurs.
mt: The tomb of Tutankhamun (KV62). KV62 is perhaps the most famous of the tombs in the valley, the place where Howard Carter discovered in 1922 the royal burial almost intact of the young king. However, compared to most of the other royal tombs, the tomb of Tutankhamun is hardly worth visiting, being much smaller and with limited decoration. Anyone wishing to see the traces of damage caused to the mummy during attempts to remove it from the coffin will be disappointed because only the head and shoulders are visible. The fabulous riches of the tomb are no longer there, but have been transferred to the Egyptian Museum in Cairo. Visitors with limited time would be better off spending it elsewhere.
ref: Tomb of Tutankhamun (KV62). KV62 may be the most famous of the tombs in the Valley, the scene of Howard Carter's 1922 discovery of the almost intact royal burial of the young king. Compared to most of the other royal tombs, however, the tomb of Tutankhamun is barely worth visiting, being much smaller and with limited decoration. Anyone interested in seeing evidence of the damage to the mummy done during attempts to remove it from the coffin will be disappointed as only the head and shoulders are visible. The fabulous riches of the tomb are no longer in it, but have been removed to the Egyptian Museum in Cairo. Visitors with limited time would be best to spend their time elsewhere.

src: Bowen Island est une excursion populaire d'une journée ou d'un week-end qui propose du kayak, des randonnées, des boutiques, des restaurants, et plus encore. Cette communauté authentique se trouve à Howe Sound, juste à côté de Vancouver, et elle est facilement accessible par des bateaux-taxis qui partent régulièrement de Granville Island, dans le centre-ville de Vancouver. Pour ceux qui aiment les activités de plein air, une randonnée dans le couloir Sea to Sky est indispensable. Whistler (à une heure et demi de route partant de Vancouver) est cher, mais s'est fait connaître grâce aux Jeux olympiques d'hiver de 2010. En hiver, profitez de certaines des meilleurs pistes de skis d'Amérique du Nord et, en été, goûtez à d'authentiques randonnées en VTT.
mt: Bowen Island is a popular day or weekend excursion that offers kayaking, hiking, shops, restaurants, and more. This authentic community is located at Howe Sound, just next to Vancouver, and is easily accessible by water taxis that leave regularly from Granville Island, in downtown Vancouver. For those who love outdoor activities, a hike in the Sea to Sky corridor is a must. Whistler (an hour and a half drive from Vancouver) is expensive, but has become known for the 2010 Winter Olympics. In winter, enjoy some of the best ski slopes in North America and, in summer, taste authentic mountain biking.
ref: Bowen Island is a popular day trip or weekend excursion offering kayaking, hiking, shops, restaurants, and more. This authentic community is located in Howe Sound just off Vancouver, and is easily accessed via scheduled water taxis departing Granville Island in downtown Vancouver. For those who enjoy outdoor activities, a trek up the Sea to Sky corridor is essential. Whistler (1.5 hour drive from Vancouver) is expensive but well-known because of the 2010 Winter Olympics. In the winter, enjoy some of the best skiing in North America, and in the summer try some authentic mountain biking.

src: Victoria Falls est une ville située dans la partie occidentale du Zimbabwe, de l'autre côté de la frontière avec Livingstone, en Zambie, et près du Botswana. La ville est située juste à côté des chutes, qui constituent l’attraction principale, mais cette destination touristique populaire offre aux amateurs d’aventure aussi bien qu’aux touristes de nombreuses possibilités pour un séjour prolongé. Pendant la saison des pluies (de novembre à mars), le volume d'eau sera plus élevé et les chutes seront plus dramatiques. Vous êtes sûr de vous faire mouiller si vous traversez le pont ou si vous marchez le long des pistes qui serpentent près des chutes. D'un autre côté, c'est bien parce que le volume d'eau est extrêmement élevé que la vue des chutes en sera obstruée !
mt: Victoria Falls is a town in western Zimbabwe, across the border with Livingstone, Zambia, and near Botswana. The town is located just next to the falls, which constitute the main attraction, but this popular tourist destination offers adventure seekers as well as tourists many opportunities for an extended stay. During the rainy season (November to March), the water volume will be higher and the falls will be more dramatic. You are sure to get wet if you cross the bridge or walk along the paths that wind near the falls. On the other hand, it is because the water volume is extremely high that the view of the falls will be obstructed!
ref: Victoria Falls is a town in the western portion of Zimbabwe, across the border from Livingstone, Zambia, and near Botswana. The town lies immediately next to the falls, and they are the major attraction, but this popular tourist destination offers both adventure seekers and sightseers plenty of opportunities for a longer stay. In the rainy season (November to March), the water volume will be higher and the Falls will be more dramatic. You are guaranteed to get wet if you cross the bridge or walk along the trails winding near the Falls. On the other hand, it is precisely because the volume of water is so high that your viewing of the actual Falls will be obscured—by all the water!

src: Les règles concernant la photographie régulière s'appliquent également à l'enregistrement vidéo, voire même davantage. S'il est interdit de prendre une simple photo de quelque chose, il ne faut même pas penser à en enregistrer une vidéo. Si vous utilisez un drone, vérifiez bien à l'avance ce que vous êtes autorisé à filmer et quels permis ou licences supplémentaires sont nécessaires. Faire voler un drone près d’un aéroport ou au-dessus d’une foule est presque toujours une mauvaise idée, même si ce n’est pas illégal dans votre région.
mt: The rules regarding regular photography also apply to video recording, or even more so. If it is forbidden to take a simple photo of something, you should not even think about recording a video of it. If you use a drone, make sure to check beforehand what you are allowed to film and what additional permits or licenses are required. Flying a drone near an airport or over a crowd is almost always a bad idea, even if it is not illegal in your region.
ref: Rules regarding regular photography also apply to video recording, possibly even more so. If just taking a photo of something isn't allowed, then you shouldn't even think of recording a video of it. If using a drone, check well in advance as to what you are allowed to film and what permits or additional licensing are required. Flying a drone near an airport or over a crowd is almost always a bad idea, even if it's not illegal in your area.

If using a drone, check well in advance as to what you are allowed to film and what permits or additional licensing are required. Flying a drone near an airport or over a crowd is almost always a bad idea, even if it's not illegal in your area.

src: L’enregistrement est une exigence supplémentaire pour la procédure de visa. Dans certains pays, vous devez vous faire enregistrer et indiquer l’adresse de votre lieu de séjour auprès des autorités locales. Cela peut nécessiter de remplir un formulaire auprès de la police locale ou une visite aux bureaux de l'immigration. Dans beaucoup de pays disposant d'une telle loi, les hôtels locaux s'occuperont eux-mêmes de l'enregistrement (n'oubliez pas de demander). Dans d'autres cas, seules les personnes résidant hors hébergements touristiques doivent s'enregistrer. Toutefois, la loi est beaucoup plus obscure, donc il conviendra de se renseigner au préalable.
mt: The registration is an additional requirement for the visa procedure. In some countries, you must register and indicate the address of your place of stay with local authorities. This may require filling out a form with the police or a visit to the immigration offices. In many countries with such a law, local hotels will take care of the registration (don't forget to ask). In other cases, only people staying outside tourist accommodation must register. However, the law is much more obscure, so it is advisable to inquire beforehand.
ref: Registration is an additional requirement for the visa process. In some countries, you must register your presence and address where you are staying with the local authorities. This might require filling out a form with the local police or a visit to the immigration offices. In many countries with such a law, local hotels will handle the registration (make sure to ask). In other cases, only those staying outside of tourist accommodations need to register.  However, this makes the law much more obscure, so find out beforehand.

src: Le bénévolat en voyage est un excellent moyen de faire une différence, mais il ne s’agit pas seulement de donner. Vivre et faire du bénévolat dans un pays étranger est une excellente façon de découvrir une culture différente, de rencontrer de nouvelles personnes, d'apprendre à se connaître soi-même, à acquérir de nouvelles perspectives et même de nouvelles compétences. Cela peut également être un bon moyen d'étirer un budget pour permettre un séjour plus long quelque part, car de nombreux emplois de bénévoles offrent le gîte et le couvert et certains versent un petit salaire.
mt: Volunteering abroad is a great way to make a difference, but it's not just about giving. Living and volunteering abroad is a great way to discover a different culture, meet new people, learn more about yourself, gain new perspectives and even new skills. It can also be a good way to stretch a budget to allow for a longer stay somewhere, as many volunteer jobs offer accommodation and some pay a small salary.
ref: Volunteering while travelling is a great way to make a difference but it's not just about giving. Living and volunteering in a foreign country is a great way to get to know a different culture, meet new people, learn about yourself, get a sense of perspective and even gain new skills. It can also be a good way to stretch a budget to allow a longer stay somewhere since many volunteer jobs provide room and board and a few pay a small salary.

src: Le voyage à Walt Disney World représente un pèlerinage important pour de nombreuses familles américaines. La visite « typique » consiste à prendre l’avion pour l’aéroport international d’Orlando, se rendre en bus à un hôtel Disney situé sur le site, y séjourner environ une semaine sans quitter les installations Disney et rentrer chez soi. Une infinité de variations sont possibles, mais c’est ce qu’entendent la plupart des gens lorsqu’ils parlent d’« aller à Disney World ». De nombreux billets vendus en ligne sur des sites d'enchères tels que eBay ou Craigslist sont des billets valables dans les parcs pendant plusieurs jours mais déjà partiellement utilisés. Bien que cette activité soit très courante, elle est interdite par Disney : les billets ne sont pas transférables.
mt: A trip to Walt Disney World is an important pilgrimage for many American families. The "typical" visit consists of flying to Orlando International Airport, taking a bus to a Disney hotel on the site, staying there for about a week without leaving the Disney property, and returning home. An infinite number of variations are possible, but that's what most people mean when they talk about "going to Disney World." Many tickets sold online on auction sites such as eBay or Craigslist are multi-day park tickets that have already been partially used. Although this activity is very common, it is prohibited by Disney: tickets are not transferable.
ref: "Traveling to Walt Disney World represents a major pilgrimage for many American families. The ""typical"" visit involves flying into Orlando International Airport, busing to an on-site Disney hotel, spending about a week without leaving Disney property, and returning home. There are infinite variations possible, but this remains what most people mean when they talk of ""going to Disney World"". Many tickets sold online through auction websites such as eBay or Craigslist are partially used multi-day park-hopper tickets. While this is a very common activity, it is prohibited by Disney: the tickets are non-transferable."

src: Quiconque envisage de se rendre dans un pays qui pourrait être considéré comme une zone de guerre devrait recevoir une formation professionnelle. Une recherche sur internet de « Cours en environnement hostile » fournira probablement l'adresse d'une entreprise locale. Un cours couvrira normalement toutes les questions abordées ici de manière beaucoup plus détaillée, généralement avec une expérience pratique. Une formation dure normalement de 2 à 5 jours et comprend des jeux de rôle, beaucoup de premiers secours, et parfois un entraînement au maniement des armes. Les livres et les magazines traitant de la survie en milieu sauvage sont courants, mais les publications traitant des zones de guerre sont peu nombreuses.
mt: Anyone planning to travel to a country that could be considered a war zone should receive professional training. A search on the internet for "Hostile Environment Training" will likely provide the address of a local company. A course will typically cover all the issues discussed here in much greater detail, usually with practical experience. A course typically lasts 2 to 5 days and includes role playing, a lot of first aid, and sometimes weapons training. Books and magazines on survival in the wilderness are common, but publications on war zones are rare.
ref: Anyone planning a visit to a country that could be considered a war zone should get professional training. A search of the Internet for 'Hostile environment course' will probably provide the address of a local company. A course will normally cover all the issues discussed here in far greater detail, usually with practical experience. A course will normally be from 2-5 days and will involve role play, a lot of first aid and sometimes weapons training. Books and magazines dealing with wilderness survival are common, but publications dealing with war zones are few.

src: Il existe différentes méthodes de purification de l'eau, dont certaines sont plus efficaces contre des menaces spécifiques. Dans certaines localités, il suffit de faire bouillir l'eau pendant une minute ; dans d'autres, il faut le faire pendant plusieurs minutes. L’efficacité des filtres varie, et si vous avez un souci, vous devriez envisager d’acheter votre eau dans une bouteille scellée auprès d’une entreprise réputée.
mt: There are different water purification methods, some of which are more effective against specific threats. In some areas, it is enough to boil the water for a minute; in others, it is necessary to do so for several minutes. The effectiveness of filters varies, and if you have a problem, you should consider buying your water in a sealed bottle from a reputable company.
ref: There are different ways of purifying water, some more effective against specific threats. In some areas boiling water for a minute is enough, in others several minutes are needed. Filters vary in effectiveness, and should you have a concern, then you should consider buying your water in a sealed bottle from a reputable company.

src: Les courants d'arrachement sont les courants qui reviennent des vagues qui se brisent sur la plage, souvent sur un écueil ou équivalent. En raison de la topologie sous-marine, le flux de retour est concentré sur quelques sections plus profondes, et un courant rapide vers les eaux profondes peut s’y former. Dans la plupart des cas, les décès sont dus à l'épuisement qui résulte d'une tentative de nager à contre-courant, ce qui peut être impossible. Dès que vous sortez du courant, le retour à la nage n'est pas plus difficile que d'habitude. Essayez de viser un endroit où vous ne serez pas pris à nouveau.  Il est possible également, qu'en fonction de vos compétences et de si vous avez été repéré ou pas, vous voudrez peut-être attendre les secours.
mt: Rip currents are the currents that return from waves that break on the beach, often on a reef or equivalent. Due to the underwater topography, the return flow is concentrated on a few deeper sections, and a strong current towards the deep water can form. In most cases, deaths are due to exhaustion resulting from an attempt to swim against the current, which may be impossible. Once you get out of the current, the return to swimming is not any harder than usual. Try to aim for a place where you will not be caught again. It is also possible, depending on your skills and if you have been spotted or not, you may want to wait for rescue.
ref: Rip currents are the returning flow from waves breaking off the beach, often at a reef or similar. Due to the underwater topology the return flow is concentrated at a few deeper sections, and a fast current to deep water may form there. Most deaths happen as result of fatigue trying to swim back against the current, which may be impossible. As soon as you get out of the current, swimming back is no more difficult than normally. Try aiming somewhere where you are not caught again or, depending on your skills and on whether you have been noticed, you might want to wait for rescue.

src: Les voies navigables intérieures peuvent être un excellent thème pour des vacances. Par exemple, visiter des châteaux dans la vallée de la Loire, la vallée du Rhin ou faire une croisière vers des sites intéressants sur le Danube ou faire du bateau le long du canal Erie. Elles définissent également les itinéraires pour les sentiers de randonnée et les pistes cyclables populaires.
mt: Inland waterways can be a great theme for vacations. For example, visiting castles in the Loire Valley, the Rhine Valley or taking a cruise to interesting sites on the Danube or boating along the Erie Canal. They also define the routes for popular hiking trails and bike paths.
ref: Inland waterways can be a good theme to base a holiday around. For example visiting castles in the Loire Valley, the Rhine valley or taking a cruise to interesting cites on the Danube or boating along the Erie Canal. They also define routes for popular hiking and cycling trails.

src: Au nord, la région est délimitée par le Sahel, et au sud et à l'ouest par l'océan Atlantique. Aux femmes : Il est recommandé à toute femme qui voyage de dire qu’elle est mariée, quel que soit son état civil. Il est également conseillé de porter une alliance (qui ne doit pas sembler trop précieuse. Les femmes doivent réaliser que certaines différences culturelles peuvent entraîner des comportements qu'elles considèrent comme du harcèlement. Il est en effet courant qu'elles soient suivies, attrapées par le bras, etc. Soyez ferme dans le refus des avances hommes, et n'ayez pas peur de tenir bon (différences culturelles ou non, ça ne veut pas dire que c'est acceptable !)
mt: To the north, the region is bounded by the Sahel, and to the south and west by the Atlantic Ocean. To women: It is recommended that any woman who travels say she is married, regardless of her civil status. It is also advisable to wear a ring (which should not seem too valuable. Women should realize that some cultural differences may lead to behaviors they consider harassment. It is common that they are followed, grabbed by the arm, etc. Be firm in refusing men's advances, and do not be afraid to hold firm (cultural differences or not, that does not mean it's acceptable!).
ref: In the north the region is bounded by the Sahel, and in the south and west by the Atlantic Ocean. Women: It is recommended that any women travellers say that they are married, regardless of actual marital status. It is helpful to also wear a ring (just not one that looks too expensive. Women should realize that cultural differences may result in what they would consider harassment and it is not uncommon to be followed, grabbed by the arm, etc. Be firm in turning down men, and don't be afraid to stand your ground (cultural differences or not, it doesn't make it ok!).

src: La faune et la flore sauvages sont des thèmes parmi les plus difficiles à capturer pour un photographe, et nécessitent une combinaison de chance, de patience, d'expérience et un bon équipement. La photographie de la vie sauvage est souvent considérée comme allant de soi, mais comme pour la photographie en général, une image vaut mille mots. La photographie de la vie sauvage nécessite souvent un long téléobjectif. Toutefois, d'autres scènes comme une volée d'oiseaux ou une minuscule créature exigent l'utilisation d'autres objectifs. De nombreux animaux exotiques sont difficiles à trouver, et les parcs ont parfois des règles relatives à la prise de photos à des fins commerciales. Les animaux sauvages peuvent être timides ou agressifs. L'environnement peut être froid, chaud ou autrement hostile.
mt: Wildlife and wild flora are among the most difficult subjects to capture for a photographer, and require a combination of luck, patience, experience and good equipment. Wildlife photography is often considered to be a given, but as with photography in general, a picture is worth a thousand words. Wildlife photography often requires a long telephoto lens. However, other scenes such as a flock of birds or a tiny creature require the use of other lenses. Many exotic animals are difficult to find, and parks may have rules regarding taking photos for commercial purposes. Wild animals can be shy or aggressive. The environment can be cold, hot or otherwise hostile.
ref: Wildlife is among the most challenging motifs for a photographer, and needs a combination of good luck, patience, experience and good equipment. Wildlife photography is often taken for granted, but like photography in general, a picture is worth a thousand words. Wildlife photography often requires a long telephoto lens, though things like a flock of birds or a tiny creature need other lenses. Many exotic animals are hard to find, and parks sometimes have rules about taking photographs for commercial purposes. Wild animals might either be shy or aggressive. The environment might be cold, hot, or otherwise hostile.
