src: Quiconque se rend en voiture à des latitudes élevées ou franchit des cols de montagne doit envisager la possibilité de neige, de glace ou de températures glaciales. Sur les routes glacées et enneigées, le frottement est faible et vous ne pouvez pas conduire comme si vous étiez sur l'asphalte nu. Pendant les blizzards, il peut tomber en très peu de temps assez de neige pour vous bloquer. La visibilité peut également être limitée par des chutes de neige ou de la poudrerie ou par la condensation ou la glace sur les vitres des véhicules. D'autre part, la présence de glace et de neige est normale dans de nombreux pays, et la circulation est pratiquement ininterrompue toute l'année.
mt: Anyone driving to high latitudes or crossing mountain passes must consider the possibility of snow, ice or glacial temperatures. On icy and snowy roads, traction is low and you cannot drive as if you were on bare asphalt. During blizzards, it can snow enough in very little time to block you. Visibility can also be limited by snowfall or powdering or by condensation or ice on vehicle windows. On the other hand, the presence of ice and snow is normal in many countries, and traffic is almost uninterrupted all year round.
ref: Anyone who's going to drive at high latitudes or over mountain passes should consider the possibility of snow, ice, or freezing temperatures. On icy and snowy roadways, friction is low and you cannot drive as if you were on bare asphalt. During blizzards, enough snow to get you stuck can fall in very little time. Visibility may also be restricted by falling or blowing snow or by condensation or ice on vehicle windows. On the other hand, icy and snowy conditions are normal in many countries, and traffic goes on mostly uninterrupted all year round.

src: À moins que vous ne soyez un diplomate, travailler à l’étranger signifie généralement que vous devrez remplir la déclaration d’impôts sur le revenu dans le pays où vous êtes basé. L'impôt sur le revenu est structuré différemment dans différents pays, et les taux d'imposition et les tranches d'imposition varient largement d'un pays à l'autre. Dans certains pays fédéraux tels que les États-Unis et le Canada, l'impôt sur le revenu est prélevé à la fois au niveau fédéral et au niveau local, de sorte que les taux et les tranches d'imposition peuvent varier d'une région à l'autre.
mt: Unless you are a diplomat, working abroad usually means that you will have to file a tax return in the country where you are based. Income tax is structured differently in different countries, and tax rates and tax brackets vary widely from country to country. In federal countries such as the United States and Canada, income tax is levied both at the federal level and at the local level, so that tax rates and tax brackets may vary from region to region.
ref: Unless you are a diplomat, working overseas generally means that you will have to file income tax in the country you are based in. Income tax is structured differently in different countries, and the tax rates and brackets vary widely from one country to another. In some federal countries, such as the United States and Canada, income tax is levied both at the federal level and at the local level, so the rates and brackets can vary from region to region.

src: À moins que vous ne soyez un diplomate, travailler à l’étranger signifie généralement que vous devrez remplir la déclaration d’impôts sur le revenu dans le pays où vous êtes basé. L'impôt sur le revenu est structuré différemment dans différents pays, et les taux d'imposition et les tranches d'imposition varient largement d'un pays à l'autre. Dans certains pays fédéraux tels que les États-Unis et le Canada, l'impôt sur le revenu est prélevé à la fois au niveau fédéral et au niveau local, de sorte que les taux et les tranches d'imposition peuvent varier d'une région à l'autre.
mt: Unless you are a diplomat, working abroad usually means that you will have to file a tax return in the country where you are based. Income tax is structured differently in different countries, and tax rates and tax brackets vary widely from country to country. In federal countries such as the United States and Canada, income tax is levied both at the federal level and at the local level, so that tax rates and tax brackets may vary from region to region.
ref: Unless you are a diplomat, working overseas generally means that you will have to file income tax in the country you are based in. Income tax is structured differently in different countries, and the tax rates and brackets vary widely from one country to another. In some federal countries, such as the United States and Canada, income tax is levied both at the federal level and at the local level, so the rates and brackets can vary from region to region.

src: Une exposition internationale (communément appelée exposition universelle ou tout simplement expo) est un grand festival international des arts et des sciences. Les pays participants organisent des expositions artistiques et éducatives dans leurs pavillons nationaux pour mettre en lumière les problèmes mondiaux ou la culture et l'histoire de leur pays. Les expositions horticoles internationales sont des événements spécialisés qui présentent des vitrines florales, des jardins botaniques et tout ce qui concerne les plantes. Bien qu'elles puisent théoriquement avoir lieu tous les ans (à condition que ce soit dans des pays différents), dans la pratique, ce n'est pas le cas. Ces manifestations durent normalement entre trois et six mois et se déroulent sur des sites d’au moins 50 hectares.
mt: An international exposition (commonly called an international exposition or simply an expo) is a large festival of arts and sciences. Participating countries organize artistic and educational exhibitions in their national pavilions to highlight global issues or the culture and history of their country. Horticultural expositions are specialized events that present floral displays, botanical gardens and all things related to plants. Although they theoretically can take place every year (provided that it is in different countries), in practice, this is not the case. These events usually last between three and six months and take place on sites of at least 50 hectares.
ref: A World's Fair (commonly called World Exposition, or simply Expo) is large international festival of arts and sciences. Participating countries present artistic and educational displays in national pavilions to showcase world issues or their country's culture and history. International Horticultural Expositions are specialised events which showcase floral displays, botanical gardens and anything else to do with plants. Although in theory they can take place annually (so long as they are in different countries), in practice they are not. These events normally last anywhere between three and six months, and are held on sites no smaller than 50 hectares.

src: Bien que de nombreux animaux du parc soient habitués à voir des humains, il s'agit néanmoins d'espèces sauvages ; veuillez ne pas les nourrir ni les déranger. Selon les autorités du parc, il faut se tenir à au moins 100 mètres des ours et des loups et à 25 mètres de tous les autres animaux sauvages ! Aussi dociles qu’ils puissent paraître, le bison, l’élan, l’orignal, l’ours et presque tous les grands animaux peuvent attaquer. Chaque année, des dizaines de visiteurs sont blessés parce qu’ils n’ont pas gardé une distance suffisante. Ces animaux sont grands, sauvages et potentiellement dangereux, alors donnez-leur de l’espace. De plus, sachez que les odeurs attirent les ours et autres animaux sauvages, alors évitez de transporter ou de cuisiner des aliments odorants et gardez le camp propre.
mt: Although many park animals are used to seeing humans, they are still wild animals; please do not feed or disturb them. According to park authorities, you should stay at least 100 meters from bears and wolves and 25 meters from all other wild animals! Even though they may seem docile, the bison, moose, elk, bear, and almost all large animals can attack. Each year, dozens of visitors are injured because they did not keep a sufficient distance. These animals are large, wild, and potentially dangerous, so give them space. Also, know that smells attract bears and other wild animals, so avoid transporting or cooking odorous foods and keep the camp clean.
ref: Though many of the animals in the park are used to seeing humans, the wildlife is nonetheless wild and should not be fed or disturbed. According to park authorities, stay at least 100 yards/meters away from bears and wolves and 25 yards/meters from all other wild animals! No matter how docile they may look, bison, elk, moose, bears, and nearly all large animals can attack. Each year, dozens of visitors are injured because they didn't keep a proper distance. These animals are large, wild, and potentially dangerous, so give them their space. In addition, be aware that odors attract bears and other wildlife, so avoid carrying or cooking odorous foods and keep a clean camp.
